articles.title: Here are 20 online courses for professionals, each less than $20

articles.title: Like many Americans, my divorce destroyed my mental health and nearly drove me to suicide
articles.description: During my long divorce, I was pressed by a fear: If the relationship with my husband could dissolve, what about the relationship with my children?
articles.content:
During my long divorce, I was pressed by a fear: If the relationship with my husband could dissolve, what about the relationship with my children?

articles.author: Aaron Mamiit
articles.title: Apple rumored to be planning to remove the notch in iPhone 12
articles.description: A rumor claims that Apple may ditch the notch in the iPhone 12, which will end all debate on the controversial display feature. The tweet and render follow similar predictions by analysts on the removal of the notch, which was popularized by the iPhone X, but…
articles.content:
Apple popularized the display notch in 2017’s iPhone X, but a rumor claims that the feature is on the chopping block just a few years later.
The iPhone X notch generated a wide range of reactions. Some said it was needed to provide users with more real estat… [+2138 chars]
